Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First compute total resolution time for each case from Receive Ticket timestamp to Close Ticket timestamp. Lists each cases events in order and compute durations. Case 101: Receive 202403010800 Close 202403011015 duration 2h15m 225 hours. Case 102: Receive 202403010805 Close 202403020915 duration 25h10m 251667 hours. Case 103: 1h20m 1333 hours. Case 104: 24h10m 241667 hours. Case 105: 49h5m 490833 hours.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Durations 101 225h 103 1333h short less than 3h. 102 104 105 much longer 24 25 49h. So 102 104 105 are significantly longer outliers.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Examine each case event sequence and timings between activities. Look for long gaps waiting times or escalations. Cases without escalations 101 103 quick. 102 105 have Escalate to Level2 Agent. 104 no escalation but long.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Compute intervals between steps for each case. Case 101 all short 10min 10min 40min 60min 15min. Case 102 gaps 25min 30min 2h30min AssignEscalate 2h30min EscalateInvestigate 19h InvestigateResolve. Case 103 all short. Case 104 40min ReceiveTriage 30min 3h30min AssignInvestigate 19h InvestigateResolve. Case 105 10min 25min 10min 50min then 28h EscalateInvestigate second 19h InvestigateResolve.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Long gaps indicate delays. Overnight gaps in long cases 102 104 105 after Investigate to Resolve consistently 19h from afternoon investigation to next morning 8089am. Short cases resolved same day within hour after morning investigation.

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: Reconsider interpretation of Investigate event start or completion. Discuss possibilities event marks completion or start. Treat intervals as waiting or processing times.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Hypotheses for overnight delay shift ends nonworking hours after investigation ticket waits for approval customer response batch resolution next morning policy cutoff time if investigation after noon deferred prioritization complex tickets pushed late.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Precise intervals table confirms largest 1140min 19h in three cases 1680min 28h in 105 after escalation. Consistent 19h gap from 1314 investigation to 89am resolve next day.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Root causes escalation delays esp waiting for Level2 long waiting before investigation queuing resource constraints overnight delay after investigation common to all long cases regardless escalation.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Peak hour surge all tickets morning agents busy prioritize simple quick ones complex wait pushed afternoon trigger overnight. Escalation overload Level2 backlog.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Cases 102 104 105 significantly longer due factors. Recommendations reduce waits FIFO queue more staff peak hours address overnight extend hours dedicated team optimize escalation SLAs training Level1 improve triage automation.
